# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Deserializes an attributes codable representation from the given decoder.

## Declaration

```swift
init(from decoder: any Decoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **decoder**: An object to deserialize.

## Creating an attributes codable representation

- **init(attributes:)**: Creates an attributes codable representation with the given collection of object attributes.
